title: CCTV Operator Training Course
headline: Learn how to become a closed circuit television (CCTV) operator in the UK in this free online training course.
description: The UK has between 4 and 6 million CCTV cameras with more than 11 000 concentrated on the London Underground alone. These figures will continue to rise in the future as surveillance plays an increasing role in protecting public safety. Our course provides the training you need to follow this lucrative career and lays out the legal requirements and traits of those who install and monitor CCTV cameras. Sign up to learn how to do this important job.
courseDescription:
This security training course provides the skills required to operate close circuit television cameras (CCTV) and other complex security systems. We introduce you to the operational requirements, key performance indicators and system requirements of CCTV cameras. To become a CCTV operator, you must know how to maintain data security and protect the public and its property. We delve into the UK’s CCTV Operation Code of Practice to prepare you for the job.

The course teaches you how to operate CCTV systems to provide the training required of a CCTV operator. We then show you how to analyse hostile surveillance and emphasise the importance and dynamics of behavioural analysis. CCTV maintains its distinctive character while playing a significant role in many existing security networks. We break down such systems to help you understand how CCTV systems operate. We also explain how to install each component to provide the training you require as a CCTV operator.

A CCTV system consists of several cameras, monitoring and recording functions and activities performed in the control room. We explain how a CCTV operator can keep an eye on CCTV screens both reactively and proactively and show you how such video surveillance systems maintain safety and security. Finally, we discuss the UK’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and explain how it relates to CCTV operators. Surveillance plays an increasingly important  role in protecting public safety so take advantage of this trend and sign up for this security training course to learn how to become a CCTV operator in the UK.
